title: Joker’s creepy laugh edited with Seth Rogen might be even more sinister
text:
Guess his laugh is a meme now (Picture: DC Comics)

So someone’s gone and memefied Joaquin Phoenix’s haunting Joker laugh and somehow the film just became even more sinister.

Of course the internet is a place where we cannot have nice things, but some very crafty fellows with a lot of time on their hands are now taking over Joker’s iconic laugh and mixing it with various others.

Like Seth Rogen, Bill Hader, Nicki Minaj, an anime character – the list goes on.

It all spawned from a short moment in the Todd Phillips-directed film which saw Arthur Fleck walking through a corridor laughing.

Arthur is battling mental illness, and the most visible symptom is his spontaneous and cackling laugh as part of a neurological condition known as pseudobulbar affect.

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

In the film, released last week, we see, or, rather, hear Arthur break out in strained laughter during uncomfortable moments.

Advertisement

Advertisement

However, now it’s been given the meme treatment, all thanks to an original edit by Twitter user @ryanheezy.

Ryan’s clip was posted yesterday and featured the husky and breathy laugh of Seth.

It’s something to behold.

the joker but he laughs like seth rogen pic.twitter.com/KbvMt5Ij7b — freddy kroger (@ryanheezy) October 8, 2019

After that, it was anyone’s game as they added their own versions.

A lot of them.

The Joker but he laughs like Bill Hader. pic.twitter.com/dMqf3osV9y — Bill Hader's seagull laugh (@LaughBill) October 8, 2019

We mean, we’ve even got a Peter Griffin here.

Yes, seeing the bumbling cackle of the Family Guy cartoon character is really making our day.

The joker but he laughs like Peter Griffin pic.twitter.com/dyX5RvaEEb — Radja Afif (@RadjaAfifKedah) October 8, 2019

What about Nicki Minaj?

Ever wanted the seemingly-forced tones of her giggle in your senses from Fleck?

the joker but he laughs like nicki minaj pic.twitter.com/Pr5A4ORcZU — gina (@chalameche) October 8, 2019

You know Ricky Gervais has quite the cackle too.

Oh, alright, whack him in there.

the joker but he laugh’s like anime girl pic.twitter.com/8hrFx4M2Pi — ☾ (@veenuswrld) October 8, 2019

the joker but he laughs like samuel l. jackson pic.twitter.com/v0F3gZCl4R — 𝙠𝙞𝙖𝙣𝙖 (@NE0SMATRIX) October 8, 2019

The film might be making a dent online but it’s also raging through the box office, smashing all sorts of records over the weekend for its opening.

Advertisement

Advertisement

According to Reuters, Joker raked in an impressive £93.5million (£75,849,000) on its debut – smashing box office records to become the highest October launch of all time.

The record was previously held by 2018 thriller Venom that brought in $80million (£64,898,800).

Joker is in cinemas now.

description: Joker's creepy laugh edited with Seth Rogen might be even more sinister as moment turned into meme.
